page.title: 08Jobs and No Jobs
page.content: The last decade has seen major chan- ges in local employment. Male employ- ment in heavy industries has reduced greatly. Risca and Crosskeys have few remaining miners. The steelworks at Llanwern has shed thousands; the alum- inium plant at Rogerstone has contrac- ted. Many former workers from these industries reside here. Present adult male unemployment is over 30%; for teenagers, 50%. Prospects are very poor in the near future. There is a wide variety of services employment and a few small light manu- facturers. Many employees are female - often part-time, often low-paid. Machen, a dormitory village of Caer- philly, Newport and Cardiff, has little local employment. Risca and Crosskeys will increase their dor- mitory function in future.
